languages.text: В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} создает вокруг случайного противника особую зону 7×7 клеток, которая взрывается в конце раунда. На всех, кто окажется в зоне на момент взрыва, будет наложен эффект гнев Эсхатоса на 2 раунда. Если существо уже находится под воздействием гнева Эсхатоса, этот эффект снимается.
languages.original_text: At the start of each round, creates a special 7×7 zone around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos removes instead.

languages.text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} создает вокруг случайного противника особую зону 7×7 клеток, которая взрывается в конце раунда. На всех, кто окажется в зоне на момент взрыва, будет наложен эффект гнев Эсхатоса на 2 раунда. Если существо уже находится под воздействием гнева Эсхатоса, этот эффект снимается.

traits.locale_text: At the start of each round, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

languages.text: Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se crea alrededor de un enemigo al azar una zona especial de 7×7 que explota al final del asalto. Todas las criaturas en la zona en el momento de la explosión sufren el efecto ira de Eschatos durante 2 asaltos. Si la criatura ya sufre este efecto, lo pierde.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se crea alrededor de un enemigo al azar una zona especial de 7×7 que explota al final del asalto. Todas las criaturas en la zona en el momento de la explosión sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} ira de Eschatos durante 2 asaltos. Si la criatura ya sufre este efecto, lo pierde.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，在一名随机敌人身边创建一片特殊的7×7区域，该区域在本轮结束时爆炸。区域发生爆炸时，区域内的所有敌人都会承受“终焉审判之怒”效果，持续两轮。如果此生物已经受到“终焉审判之怒”效果影响，则改为移除此效果。
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

traits.locale_text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，在一名随机敌人身边创建一片特殊的7×7区域，该区域在本轮结束时爆炸。区域发生爆炸时，区域内的所有敌人都会承受“终焉审判之怒”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，持续两轮。如果此生物已经受到“终焉审判之怒”效果影响，则改为移除此效果。
每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，在一名随机敌人身边创建一片特殊的7×7区域，该区域在本轮结束时爆炸。区域发生爆炸时，区域内的所有敌人都会承受“终焉审判之怒”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，持续两轮。如果此生物已经受到“终焉审判之怒”效果影响，则改为移除此效果。

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の始めに、特別な7×7の領域がランダムな敵の周りに作られ、それはラウンドの終了時に爆発する。爆発時点でその領域にいる者は、2ラウンドの間エスカトスの怒り効果を負う。その生物がすでにこの効果を受けているなら、代わりにエスカトスの怒りは解除される。
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

traits.locale_text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の始めに、特別な7×7の領域がランダムな敵の周りに作られ、それはラウンドの終了時に爆発する。爆発時点でその領域にいる者は、2ラウンドの間エスカトスの怒り{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を負う。その生物がすでにこの効果を受けているなら、代わりにエスカトスの怒りは解除される。
各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の始めに、特別な7×7の領域がランダムな敵の周りに作られ、それはラウンドの終了時に爆発する。爆発時点でその領域にいる者は、2ラウンドの間エスカトスの怒り{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を負う。その生物がすでにこの効果を受けているなら、代わりにエスカトスの怒りは解除される。

languages.text: Zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird eine spezielle 7×7-Zone um einen zufälligen Feind geschaffen, die am Ende der Runde explodiert. Wer sich zum Zeitpunkt der Explosion in der Zone befindet, wird 2 Runden lang mit "Zorn des Eschatos" belegt. War die Kreatur bereits mit diesem Effekt belegt, wird "Zorn des Eschatos" entfernt.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird eine spezielle 7×7-Zone um einen zufälligen Feind geschaffen, die am Ende der Runde explodiert. Jeder, der sich zum Zeitpunkt der Explosion in der Zone befindet, erleidet 2 Runden lang den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Zorn des Eschatos. Wenn die Kreatur bereits von diesem Effekt betroffen ist, wird Zorn des Eschatos stattdessen entfernt.

languages.text: Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, une zone spéciale de 7 × 7 est créée autour d'un ennemi aléatoire qui explose à la fin du round. Tout personnage présent dans la zone au moment de l'explosion subit l'effet Colère d'Eschatos pendant 2 rounds. Si la créature est déjà frappée par cet effet, celui-ci se dissipe.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.

traits.locale_text: Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, une zone spéciale de 7×7 est créée autour d'un ennemi aléatoire qui explose à la fin du round. Tout personnage présent dans la zone au moment de l'explosion subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Colère d'Eschatos pendant 2 rounds. Si la créature est déjà frappée par cet effet, celui-ci se dissipe.

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundun{/g} başlangıcında rastgele bir düşmanın çevresinde 7×7 hücrelik, raundun sonunda patlayan özel bir bölge oluşturulur. Patlama anında bölgede olan herkes, Eskatos'un gazabı etkisine maruz kalır. Etki 2 raunt sürer. Yaratık, zaten bu etkiden muzdaripse tam aksine Eskatos'un gazabı ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a special 7×7 zone is created around a random enemy that explodes at the end of the round. Anyone in the zone at the time of the explosion will suffer the wrath of Eschatos effect for 2 rounds. If the creature is already affected by this effect, wrath of Eschatos is removed instead.
